1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Subtree filter.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Subtree.Filter
6  ( SubtreeFilter (..),
7    subtreeId, subtreeEq,
8    subtreeKeep, subtreeOmit,
9    subtreeChain,
10    subtreeAttr,
11    subtreeFilter,
12    subtreeFilterOn,
13  ) where
14
15import qualified System.FilePath.Glob                    as Glob
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                as O
17
18-- | Subtree filter.
19data SubtreeFilter
20    = SubtreeId                                 -- ^ Identity
21    | SubtreeEq    String                       -- ^ Equality
22    | SubtreeKeep  String Glob.Pattern          -- ^ Glob
23    | SubtreeOmit  String Glob.Pattern          -- ^ Anti-glob
24    | SubtreeAttr  String String                -- ^ Attribute
25    | SubtreeChain SubtreeFilter SubtreeFilter  -- ^ Filter chain
26      deriving (Show, Eq)
27
28instance Monoid SubtreeFilter where
29    mempty  = SubtreeId
30    mappend = subtreeChain
31
32-- | Identity filter.
33subtreeId :: SubtreeFilter
34subtreeId = SubtreeId
35
36-- | Equal filter.
37subtreeEq :: String -> SubtreeFilter
38subtreeEq = SubtreeEq
39
40-- | Glob filter.
41subtreeKeep :: String -> SubtreeFilter
42subtreeKeep s = SubtreeKeep s $ Glob.compile s
43
44-- | Anti-glob filter.
45subtreeOmit :: String -> SubtreeFilter
46subtreeOmit s = SubtreeOmit s $ Glob.compile s
47
48-- | Filter chain.
49subtreeChain :: O.Bin SubtreeFilter
50subtreeChain SubtreeId f = f
51subtreeChain f SubtreeId = f
52subtreeChain f g = SubtreeChain f g
53
54-- | Attribute filter.
55subtreeAttr :: String -> String -> SubtreeFilter
56subtreeAttr = SubtreeAttr
57
58-- | Filter strings by subtree filter.
59--
60--   >>> subtreeFilter subtreeId ["foo", "bar", "foobar"]
61--   ["foo","bar","foobar"]
62--
63--   >>> subtreeFilter (SubtreeEq "bar") ["foo", "bar", "foobar"]
64--   ["bar"]
65--
66--   >>> subtreeFilter (subtreeKeep "foo*") ["foo", "bar", "foobar"]
67--   ["foo","foobar"]
68--
69--   >>> subtreeFilter (subtreeKeep "*bar") ["foo", "bar", "foobar"]
70--   ["bar","foobar"]
71--
72--   >>> subtreeFilter (subtreeOmit "foo*") ["foo", "bar", "foobar"]
73--   ["bar"]
74--
75--   >>> subtreeFilter (subtreeOmit "foo*") ["foo", "bar", "foobar"]
76--   ["bar"]
77--
78--   >>> subtreeFilter (subtreeKeep "foo*" O.++ subtreeOmit "*bar") ["foo", "bar", "foobar"]
79--   ["foo"]
80--
81subtreeFilter :: SubtreeFilter -> O.Map [String]
82subtreeFilter = subtreeFilterOn Just
83
84subtreeFilterOn :: (a -> Maybe String) -> SubtreeFilter -> O.Map [a]
85subtreeFilterOn get f xs0 = a xs0 [f] where
86    a xs []                        = xs
87    a xs (SubtreeId : fs)          = a xs fs
88    a xs (SubtreeEq x : fs)        = a xs' fs where xs' = O.keepOn get (== x) xs
89    a xs (SubtreeKeep _ p : fs)    = a xs' fs where xs' = O.keepOn get (Glob.match p) xs
90    a xs (SubtreeOmit _ p : fs)    = a xs' fs where xs' = O.omitOn get (Glob.match p) xs
91    a xs (SubtreeAttr _ _ : fs)    = a xs fs
92    a xs (SubtreeChain f1 f2 : fs) = a xs fs' where fs' = f1 : f2 : fs
93
